SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 43
PROLEG semantics a la ASP
The deﬁnition of PROLEG program:
• A rule is a Horn clause of the form H ⇐B1, ..., Bn.
• An exception is an expression of the form exception(H, E) where
H, E are atoms.
• A program P is a pair ⟨H, E⟩where H is a set of rules and E is a
set of exceptions.
43
speaker: SYSTEM
